citeinfo.origin: Minnesota Department of Natural Resources (DNR) - Division of Ecological Resources
citeinfo.title: Aquatic Invasive Species Observations

descript.abstract: A multi-divisional effort to record the locations of aquatic invasive species in waterbodies throughout the state. Points indicate presence and/or approximate physical locations of the species.
descript.purpose: To provide a base inventory of selected invasive aquatic species in waters of the state of Minnesota. A multi-divisional effort to collect consistent information. This will provide a planning tool to help identify problem infestations and coordinate an effective response to individual species and locations for prevention and control efforts. This layer is not a complete statewide survey for aquatic invasive species.

timeperd.current: Not regularly updated since 2009. As early as 1938, most 1980s-2009

theme.themekey: AIS, alewife, bighead carp, curly-leaf pondweed, Eurasian watermilfoil, flowering rush, goldfish, grass carp, Heterosporis, Largemouth Bass Virus (LMBV), purple loosestrife, rainbow smelt, round goby, ruffe, sea lamprey, spiny waterflea, threespine stickleback, tubenose goby, white perch, zebra mussel

idinfo.useconst: None, Only registered MNDNR Metadata users may edit localities.

cntperp.cntorg: Minnesota DNR - Division of Ecological and Water Resources

dataqual.complete: Not regularly updated since 2009. This layer is not a complete statewide survey for aquatic invasive species.

horizpa.horizpar: Source layer eco_aqinvsppt4: There are multiple origins of this data. The majority of the points were collected using hand-held GPS equipment with accuracy of +/- 15 meters. Some points were generated using the center of the waterbody. Some points were generated using systematically selected locations within water boundaries. An effort was made to prevent the points from overlapping.

distinfo.distliab: The Minnesota Department of Natural Resources General Geographic Data License Agreement is online: http://www.dnr.state.mn.us/sitetools/data_software_license.html
